/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. Modern skyscrapers tower over older, more traditional structures, reflecting the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing. Cars and motorcycles fill the street, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the cityscape.
